items.sentence: Not everything Tom told me about Mary was true.
Do you really think that Tom will get deported?
Tom needs to learn how to stand up for himself.
Tom told me he wrote that poem three years ago.
Tom suggested that we leave before it got dark.
Tom started playing basketball three years ago.
Tom speaks French pretty well, don't you think?
Tom has asked me that same question many times.
Tom asked Mary a lot of questions about Boston.
This is really delicious, no question about it.
That's a totally different question altogether.
I visited a small town not too far from Boston.
I wanted to buy Tom something for his birthday.
I suspect that Tom will never agree to do that.
I suspect that Tom and Mary are doing that now.
Tom would've eaten more if he hadn't been sick.
I'm not surprised that Tom was able to do that.
Did you find out why Tom wants to go to Boston?
Did you find out why Tom wants to talk to Mary?
That isn't how you get things done around here.
